g:HTMLPanel.div:
HOW DO WE HELP ORGANIZATIONS? We create a community that can that can inspire the way you work
We create a network of other organizations that support your current projects
We find and document the needs around the world
We find and document the way other projects has been performed and how other organizations work
They are necessary to us in the sense that they provide the resources to the needs of the project. We depend of the network of organizations. Collaboration is the key point of our efforts.
In addition:
We provide a framework to find information about similar projects
We support existing projects with the recommendations of our community or finding resources within our network
If you as an organization like our way to work, join us as an organization at...
